title: Woad King Darius particles are different than they used to be and needs to be fixed with video
body:
I will explain through this video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jt5a5GpOcVg

There are technically 2 faulty particles that does not match with Woad King Darius. 

http://i.imgur.com/UfOaaiB.jpg

#1: Once you enter Noxian Might, there will be a red overlay that will encompass the screen for .5 secs or so with a color of Red. That is mistake #1 because it should be blue. 

here is the picture if you guys have a problem in finding it:

#2: Darius has the ability to get 5 stacks on an opponent. We all know this but what might not seem to make sense is that the 5 Stack bleed Indicator above the enemy's head is RED not BLUE. In the video, i show you a better alternative. I will post a picture where it shows red and the video will show blue but there is yet another problem.

This shows the new change.
http://imgur.com/f4dVNpH

This shows LIVE Woad King Darius

http://imgur.com/YViy9wZ

#3: The same picture that shows for #2 has one big problem. The line the crosses between the 5 stack axe bleed indicator has a red color BUT it should be BLUE! And the whole icon is covered in RED when it is supposed to be blue!!
http://imgur.com/f4dVNpH

#4: This is something I would love that Riot would fix so here it goes. In this Image, Darius uses Apprehend but there is some particles that shows it to be red when it should be pure blue ONLY when in Noxian Might. I don't mind that it is red when Darius isn't in Noxian might but why is there both color in Noxian Might? Doesn't makes sense. Also Bioforge Darius has the same problem with this. If this can be changed, ill be happy but that is a long shot.

http://imgur.com/gtYiYNJ

So Riot please, this has been my 3rd post on this and i have seen no responses at all. I will link those posts too.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/PQKAlVhw-riot-fix-dariuss-5-stack-bleed-indicator-for-woad-king-skin

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ZLGwGsVN-woad-king-dariuss-5-stack-bleed-indicator-does-not-match-its-particles

replies.body: Hey Dunkrius2g, sorry for not seeing your posts sooner. Thanks for bringing visibility into this, those are not the intended look for those particles. I'll look into this as soon as I can.
This is fixed ready for QA, thanks for your patience. Hope to see the blue D Town ult on the PBE soon :)
